wikifarm-farmmanagement-desc: Create, manage and delete farm wikis
wikifarm-creation-desc:
The installation is underway.

Please wait until all subsequent steps are completed.
Once completed, you will be redirected to the new wiki.
wikifarm-creation-failure-desc: Creation of this wiki failed. Please contact your administrator.
wikifarm-error-createinstancevault-targe: Wiki directory for given path already exists
wikifarm-error-generic: An error occurred, please contact your administrator
wikifarm-error-instance-limit-reached: Limit of wikis reached, suspend or remove a wiki to create a new one
wikifarm-error-invalid-path: Path already taken or otherwise invalid
wikifarm-instance-create-edit-error: An error occurred while storing the wiki data. Please try again or contact your administrator.
wikifarm-instance-limit-banner: Maximum number of concurrently active wikis is $2. There {{PLURAL:$1|is one|are $1}} active {{PLURAL:$1|wiki|wikis}}.
wikifarm-instance-name-exists: A wiki with this name already exists. You may continue, but it's recommended to choose a different name.
wikifarm-instance-path-error: Cannot generate a valid path for the wiki. Please choose a different name.
wikifarm-instance-path-invalid: Path can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores, and must be less than 255 characters long.
wikifarm-maintenance-generic: This wiki is currently in maintenance mode. Please try again later.
wikifarm-management-not-available-text: Farm management can only be accessed from the [[w:Special:FarmManagement|root wiki]]
wikifarm-remove-instructions: Please confirm that you want to delete this wiki by typing in it's path:
wikifarm-resume-prompt: Are you sure you want to resume this wiki?
wikifarm-suspend-prompt: Are you sure you want to suspend this wiki?
wikifarm-template-clone-help: Fill new wiki with data from an existing wiki
wikifarm-template-title: Choose a template for the new wiki
wikifarm-ui-search-instance-filter-hint: ... or select wikis to search in in addition to this wiki
wikifarm-team-created: Team was created successfully! Add members to your team now.
wikifarm-ui-teams-confirm-delete-member: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the team?
wikifarm-ui-teams-confirm-delete-team: Are you sure you want to remove team? This will automatically remove all members from the team.
wikifarm-ui-teams-error-delete-member: An error occurred while removing the user from the team. Please try again or contact your administrator.
wikifarm-ui-teams-error-delete-team: An error occurred while removing the team. Please try again or contact your administrator.
wikifarm-team-scope-notice: Wiki teams are available across all wikis in the farm. Same teams can be reused in all wikis.
wikifarm-role-scope-notice-local: Role assignments will only apply to current wiki
wikifarm-role-scope-notice-global: Role assignments will only apply to current wiki, unless globally assigned
wikifarm-ui-access-confirm-delete-assign: Are you sure you want to remove this assignment?
wikifarm-ui-access-error-delete-assignme: Failed to remove assignment. Please try again or contact your administrator.
wikifarm-ui-access-wiki-type-public-help: Everyone can view and edit the content - including anonymous users
wikifarm-ui-access-wiki-type-private-hel: Only users/teams with role reader or higher view the wiki. Only users/teams with role editor or higher can edit the wiki.
wikifarm-ui-access-wiki-type-protected-h: All users, even without any roles can view the wiki. Only users/teams with role editor or higher can edit the wiki.
wikifarm-ui-access-error-set-level: Failed to set wiki type. Please try again or contact your administrator.
wikifarm-upload-file-foreign-repo-label: Upload to the shared resources wiki
wikifarm-promote-to-shared-dialog-descri: By moving this page to the shared resources wiki, it will be available for all wikis in the farm. Local copy of the page will be deleted.
wikifarm-promote-to-shared-dialog-delete: Deleted due to transfer to shared resources wiki
wikifarm-shared-resources-exists-on-shar: This page exists on the shared resources wiki
wikifarm-instances-menu-empty-favorite-t: There is currently no wiki instance added as a favourite. You can select an instance as favourite with click on the star icon
